ClassDesc: An overlay is an extra layer that sits on top of a View (the "host view") which is drawn after all other content in that view (including children, if the view is a ViewGroup). Interaction with the overlay layer is done by adding and removing drawables. An overlay requested from a ViewGroup is of type @B_android#view#ViewGroupOverlay_E@, which also supports adding and removing views.
